headline: Mitch McConnell Condemns GOP Members Who Engage With White Nationalists
author: Natalie Colarossi
sentences: "There's no place in the Republican Party for white supremacists or antisemitism," McConnell told Politico, when asked to comment on Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar's attendance at the America First Political Action Conference.
